name: Dove And Rats
description:
You are a pigeon that must dodge the rats that come out of the right and left of the screen

controls:

Use the up and down keys on your computer keyboard or you can press the buttons on the screen

Assets Used:

https://thkaspar.itch.io/tth-animals

https://totuslotus.itch.io/pixel-ui-buttons

https://omegaosg.itch.io/gameboy-sfx-pack

https://grafxkid.itch.io/seasonal-tilesets
